torso.transformationDescription:
After just a few moments, the transformation comes to an end, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a deep sigh as the itching finally stops, leaving [npc.her] torso covered with goat-like fur. Although it's relatively close-cropped and smooth over [npc.her] stomach and [npc.breasts], it's thicker on other parts of [npc.her] torso.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldGoat(goat-like)], [npc.skinFullDescription].
